name: BMAD Ralph Plugin
description: Autonomous development loop automation using the BMAD Method for executing sprints with quality gates, git workflow, and feedback tracking
long_description: BMAD Ralph Plugin transforms your Claude Code into an autonomous development powerhouse. It executes sprint stories in priority order, runs quality gates after each story, handles git workflows automatically, and tracks progress with detailed feedback. Perfect for agile teams, solo developers, and startups looking to automate their development workflow.

required.name: yq
required.description: YAML processor for sprint status files

optional.name: npm
optional.description: For running quality gates (test, lint, build)

features.title: Autonomous Loop Execution
features.description: Execute sprint stories in priority order with automatic iteration

features.title: Quality Gate Integration
features.description: Run tests, linting, and builds after each story completion

features.title: Git Workflow Automation
features.description: Automatic branch management, commits, and pull request creation

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Detailed progress logs with iteration metrics and feedback

features.title: Stuck Detection
features.description: Automatic detection and handling of blocked stories

features.title: MCP Integration
features.description: Perplexity AI research during story implementation

features.title: Hook System
features.description: Extensible hooks for pre-commit, post-story, and lifecycle events

features.title: Feedback Analytics
features.description: Aggregate feedback reports with satisfaction metrics
